original_definition: 'gas derivative' means a financial instrument specified in points 5, 6 or 7 of Section C of Annex I to Directive 2004/39/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 April 2004 on markets in financial instruments (14), where that instrument relates to natural gas;
generated_definition: 'gas derivative' means a contract for the supply of natural gas that is derived from a gas supply contract

Article\u00a02: ‘gas supply contract’ means a contract for the supply of natural gas, but does not include a gas derivative;
‘gas supply contract’ means a contract for the supply of natural gas, but does not include agas derivative;

‘gas derivative’ means a financial instrument specified in points 5, 6 or 7 of Section C of Annex I to Directive 2004/39/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 April 2004 on markets in financial instruments (14), where that instrument relates to natural gas;
